name: PneumococcalVaccineAdministered
title: Pneumococcal Vaccine Administered
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent administration of pneumococcal vaccines.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with administration of the pneumococcal vaccine. This is a grouping of CVX and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine, 13 valent (PCV13), for intramuscular use
